com.bergerkiller.bukkit.common.internal

Class PermissionHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bergerkiller.bukkit.common.internal.PermissionHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PermissionChecker

    public class PermissionHandler
extends java.lang.Object
implements PermissionChecker
    Takes care of Vault permission checks, and additional logic needed to handle permissions. It's main purpose is redirecting permission checks and providing *-wildcard support.
